review: love it, most of the same features of roku with a cleaner interface. I use this for traveling and work and have the roku at home. I kind of wish there were more channels but to be honest I only really use the netflix, prime video, plex, and hulu on my roku. The miracast feature is pretty broken, It seems able to stream youtube from your phone but any videos downloaded and played on the phone don't play or play like crap. I've heard people getting it to work but it gives me loads of trouble on my galaxy s4. Overall though I'm very happy with this product.
